title: Trump's move to create a BTC reserve might make crypto lucrative, but should you fall for the hype, and ig
author: SECTIONSTrump's move to create a BTC reserve might make crypto lucrative, but should you fall for the hype, and ignore regulatory confusion?By Yasmin Hussain, ET BureauLast Updated: Mar 17, 2025, 06:30:00 AM ISTRate StoryFollow usShareFont SizeAbcSmallAbcMediumAbcLargeSavePrintComment
description: US President Donald Trump's announcement to create a strategic Bitcoin reserve and digital asset stockpile has sparked increased trading activity among Indian crypto enthusiasts. While this might signal an incoming crypto rally, do not ignore the market's inherent volatility and risks associated with hype-driven investments. Moreover, regulatory ambiguity around this asset class is another reason you should be careful while investing in this asset.
